name: School Of Materials Science and Nanotechnology
description: The School of Materials Science and Nanotechnology is actively engaged in carrying out cutting-edge research in various areas of Nanoscience and Nanotechnology. It may be mentioned that Nanoscience and Technology is one of the major thrust areas of research in our University for the last two decades. We have a proven track record of performing high-quality research which is reflected in our list of publications and other credentials. More than 30 faculty members from Engineering and Science faculties are engaged in the activity of the School. The School is also offering an M.Tech course on Nanoscience and Technology since 2004. The main vision of the School is to carry out cutting edge research in Nanoscience and Technology and also to produce qualified manpower
